name: A Liminal Place Remastered
description:
Welcome to a world where you only find liminality and loneliness. Keep in mind, dont get lost on this dream.

Overall Gameplay

ALP is a Ray Traced walking simulator. Solve Pluzzes, do everything you want, but remember that, you will never find the exit.
But, atleast you will have relaxing waters, and nostalgic enviroments.
Game made by a teenager.

Gameplay Features


  • Ray Traced Reflections.
  • Well Made Enviroments.
  • Almost infinite halls to explore.
  • Almost INFINITE Levels.

"The choice is yours, wanderer."
